help:
Available commands:
/start - Start the bot and get instructions
/setkey YOUR_API_KEY - Save your OpenRouter API key
/setmodel MODEL_ID - Set the default AI model
/listmodels - List available AI models
/setsystemprompt YOUR_PROMPT - Set a custom system prompt (or leave empty to reset)
/setpersona <name> - Set a predefined persona/system prompt (e.g., coder, translator)
/setlang <en|id> - Set your preferred language
/resetsettings - Clear all your saved settings
/ask YOUR_QUESTION - Ask the AI a question (remembers conversation history)
/newchat - Clear the conversation history and start fresh
/search YOUR_QUERY - Perform a web search
/help - Show this help message
